summary:
- **Substantial Holder Update (FIL Limited)**  
  - Increased stake in Rhythm Biosciences from **6.04% (17.5M shares)** to **7.11% (20.6M shares)** as of 01 July 2025.  
  - Acquired **3.13M shares** between 04/09/2025 and 07/01/2025 at prices ranging **AUD 0.0518–0.0800 per share**.  
  - Largest single purchase: **559,687 shares at AUD 0.0518** on 01/07/2025.  

No other material information identified.
